1.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Monica is mixing some Thanksgiving treat (I’mNEWLINEassuming mashed potatoes) in a bowl.

lines.Line: (on phone) Okay, great!  Bye. (Hangs up as Chandler enters.) SoNEWLINEguess who’s coming to Thanksgiving dinner

lines.Character: [Chandler throws his coat on the couc

lines.Line: Chandler throws his coat on the couch
(not amused by Chandler’s joke) I miss Rachel. (To Chandler) No, myNEWLINEparents

lines.Line: Monica goes to fiddle with something on the table.

lines.Character: [Monica goes to fiddle with something on the table
lines.Line: Monica goes to fiddle with something on the table.
Yeah, and y’know, if you could not mention to them that we liveNEWLINEtogether, that would be great! (Quickly trying to change subjects), I was thinking weNEWLINEwould eat around four
(shocked at the news) Why can’t I tell them that we liveNEWLINEtogether
Because they don’t know we’re dating. (Again, trying toNEWLINEquickly change subjects.) Do you think we should eat in the kitchen? (Goes to the sink andNEWLINEthe stove to cook.
Um, well, I was going to, I-I-I really was. But um, then somewhere, justNEWLINEout of nowhere, I didn’t
Why haven’t you told them?! Wouldn’t they be happy?
Why haven’t you told them?! Wouldn’t they be happy?
(trying to change subjects, excitedly) So! Dinner in the kitchen aroundNEWLINEfour! I’ll see you then. (Pats Chandler on the shoulder and goes into the livingNEWLINEroom.
Well, um, because mainly, um, they don’t like you. I’m sorry
Maybe because you used to be aloof, or that you’re reallyNEWLINEsarcastic, or that, y’know, you joke around all the time. Or that you take off yourNEWLINEclothes and throw them on the couch
Is this why they don’t like me or why you don’t like me
Look, I know that I should’ve told them. I know I shouldn’tNEWLINEcare what they think. I’m sorry.
Y’know, it’ll be okay. It’ll be okay. Because when theyNEWLINEcome over, I will be all charming, I will make them fall in love with me, and thenNEWLINEwe’ll tell ‘em
Hey, I can be pretty charming, babe, I won YOU over, didn’t I
(hugging Chandler) I don’t think you’ll ever get my parentsNEWLINEthat drunk!

2.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler’s, Phoebe enters with a paper turkey.

lines.Line: Hey! Hey, Pheebs, check it out. Yeah, for my desert, I have chosen toNEWLINEmake a traditional English truffle

You’re not gonna mess it up
You’re not gonna mess it up
You’re not gonna mess it up
Wow, Monica, I love that, you really have faith in me. Thank you.NEWLINETechnical question, how do you know when uh, the butter’s done
Well, it’s done about two minutes before it looks like that
Oh, ooh the food smells great, Mon
And the place looks so nice
And the place looks so nice
Yeah, hey hey, Happy Thanksgiving everybody
Yeah, hey hey, Happy Thanksgiving everybody

Uh, some of her friends, yeah

Yeah, yeah, and the Indians taught the Pilgrims what it meant to be hot inNEWLINEthe new world
Dad [kisses Jack], Mom [kisses Judy]. Look! Look who it is it’sNEWLINEChandler
(less than pleased) Oh yes of course, hello Chandler
(less than pleased) Oh yes of course, hello Chandler
Mr. and Mrs. Geller, you look wonderful, it is great to have you hear,NEWLINElet us take off your coats

Chandler and Monica exchange worried looks.
Chandler and Monica exchange worried looks.

lines.Line: Rachel is in the kitchen fiddling with her English truffle. Joey and Ross, anxious toNEWLINEleave and go to Janine’s party, are egging her on to hurry up.

(looking at her truffle) Look at it, isn’t it beautiful
(looking at her truffle) Look at it, isn’t it beautiful

It’s a truffle. It’s got all of these layers. FirstNEWLINEthere’s a layer of ladyfingers, then a layer of jam, then custard, which I made fromNEWLINEscratch, [Joey and Ross make impressed faces] then raspberries, more ladyfingers, thenNEWLINEbeef sauteed with peas and onions, [Joey and Ross look like something’s wrong.] thenNEWLINEa little more custard, and then bananas, and then I just put some whipped cream on top
Joey and Ross make confused faces.
Joey and Ross make confused faces.
Joey and Ross make confused faces.
W-What was the one right before bananas

The beef? Yeah, that was weird to me, too. But then, y’know, INEWLINEthought “well, there’s mincemeat pie,” I mean that’s an EnglishNEWLINEdessert, these people just put very strange things in their food, y’know. [To Joey]NEWLINEOh! by the way, can I borrow some Rum from your place
/strong> (teasingly) And while I’m gone don’t you boys sneakNEWLINEa taste

(turning to Chandler in a scolding tone) Chandler

(shrugging his shoulders to go along with it) Vomiting stories areNEWLINEfunny..

3.SceneDescription: Rachel’s Old Bedroom, Continued from earlier. Monica enters the room.

lines.Line: Mom and dad just sent me in here to find out if you (points to Chandler)NEWLINEwere trying to get Ross stoned
Your parents caught Ross smoking pot in college and he blamed it onNEWLINEme

You! It’s not like it’s a big deal! You-you don’t stillNEWLINEdo it or anything

lines.Line: Okay, look, I think we have to tell Rachel she messed up her dessert

Look, when everyone eats that...that...Banana-Meat thing, they’re allNEWLINEgonna’ make fun of her, do you want that
